name: Aperol Spritz
recipe:
Fill a wine glass or a large balloon glass with ice cubes.
Pour the Prosecco into the glass, filling it about one-third full.
Add the Aperol, followed by a splash of soda water.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with an orange slice.
Serve immediately with a straw.

name: Bloody Mary
recipe:
Rim the rim of a highball glass with celery salt (optional).
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour vodka, tomato juice, and lemon juice over the ice.
Add a dash of Worcestershire sauce and hot sauce to taste.
Season with a pinch of salt and black pepper.
Stir well to combine all the ingredients.
Garnish with a celery stalk, lemon wedge, and/or olives.
Serve immediately and enjoy your Bloody Mary!

name: Blue Lagoon
recipe:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour vodka and blue curaçao liqueur over the ice.
Top up with lemonade or sprite.
Stir gently to combine all the ingredients.
Garnish with a lemon slice or maraschino cherry.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Blue Lagoon cocktail!

name: Cosmopolitan
recipe:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and freshly squeezed lime juice to the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime twist or orange twist.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Cosmopolitan cocktail!

name: Cuba Libre
recipe:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Squeeze the lime juice into the glass.
Pour the light rum over the ice and lime juice.
Top up with cola.
Stir gently to combine all the ingredients.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Cuba Libre!

name: Daiquiri
recipe:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add white rum, freshly squeezed lime juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel or lime twist.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Daiquiri!

name: Gin & Tonic
recipe:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour the gin over the ice.
Top up with tonic water.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a lime wedge or slice.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Gin and Tonic!

name: Hugo
recipe:
Fill a wine glass or a large balloon glass with ice cubes.
Add the elderflower syrup or liqueur, freshly squeezed lime juice, and fresh mint leaves to the glass.
Pour in the Prosecco.
Top up with soda water.
Stir gently to combine all the ingredients.
Garnish with a lime wheel or mint sprig if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Hugo cocktail!

name: Long Island Ice Tea
recipe:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add vodka, white rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, freshly squeezed lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Strain the mixture into the glass.
Top up with cola.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a lemon wedge or twist.
Serve immediately and enjoy your Long Island Iced Tea!

name: Mai Tai
recipe:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add white rum, dark rum, orange curaçao liqueur, orgeat syrup, and freshly squeezed lime juice to the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
Fill a rocks glass with crushed ice.
Strain the mixture into the glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and/or maraschino cherry.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Mai Tai!

name: Margarita
recipe:
If desired, rim the rim of a margarita glass with salt. To do this, rub a lime wedge around the rim of the glass, then dip the rim into a plate of salt.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add tequila, triple sec, freshly squeezed lime juice, and simple syrup or agave nectar to the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
Fill the margarita glass with ice cubes.
Strain the mixture into the glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Margarita!

name: Martini
recipe:
Fill a mixing glass or cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add gin or vodka and dry vermouth to the glass or shaker.
Stir or shake the mixture well until thoroughly chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.
Serve immediately and enjoy your classic Martini!

name: Mohito
recipe:
In a highball glass, muddle the fresh mint leaves with the simple syrup and freshly squeezed lime juice.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the white rum over the ice.
Top up with soda water.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a mint sprig and/or lime wedge.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Mohito!

name: Negroni
recipe:
Fill a mixing glass or cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari to the glass or shaker.
Stir the mixture well until thoroughly chilled.
Strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with ice cubes.
Garnish with an orange twist.
Serve immediately and enjoy your classic Negroni!

name: Old Fashioned
recipe:
In an old fashioned glass, muddle the sugar cube with a few dashes of Angostura bitters (or add the simple syrup if using instead of a sugar cube).
Add a couple of ice cubes to the glass.
Pour the bourbon or rye whiskey over the ice.
Stir gently to combine and chill the drink.
Garnish with an orange twist or cherry.
Serve immediately and enjoy your classic Old Fashioned!

name: Paloma
recipe:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour the tequila and freshly squeezed lime juice over the ice.
Add a pinch of salt.
Top up with grapefruit soda.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Paloma!

name: Pina Colada
recipe:
In a blender, combine white rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream.
Add a handful of ice cubes to the blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour the mixture into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and/or maraschino cherry.
Serve immediately and enjoy your tropical Piña Colada!

name: Pornstar Martini
recipe:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add vanilla vodka, passion fruit liqueur, freshly squeezed lime juice, simple syrup, and passion fruit puree or juice to the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with half of a passion fruit floating on top.
Serve immediately with a shot of Champagne or Prosecco on the side (the "pornstar" part of the drink).
Enjoy your delicious Pornstar Martini!

name: Tequila Sunrise
recipe:
Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
Pour the tequila and orange juice into the glass.
Stir well to combine.
Slowly pour the grenadine syrup over the back of a spoon or the edge of the glass, allowing it to sink to the bottom.
Garnish with an orange slice and/or maraschino cherry.
Serve immediately and enjoy your vibrant Tequila Sunrise!

name: Tom Collins
recipe:
Fill a Collins glass with ice cubes.
Pour gin, freshly squeezed lemon juice, and simple syrup into the glass.
Stir well to combine.
Top up with club soda.
Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Tom Collins!

name: Whiskey Sour
recipe:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Add whiskey, freshly squeezed lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
Strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with ice cubes.
Garnish with a lemon slice and/or cherry.
Serve immediately and enjoy your classic Whiskey Sour!
